column10: The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 5 000.

This appropriation is intended to cover the expenditure committed for promoting relations between the European Parliament and democratically elected national parliaments from third countries as well as with corresponding regional parliamentary organisations. It relates notably to activities aimed at strengthening the parliamentary capacity in new and emerging democracies
column11: promoting human rights and encouraging the use of new information and communication technologies by parliaments.

column9: This appropriation is intended to finance political parties at European level.
This appropriation is intended to finance political foundations at European level.

column7: The amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(3) of the Financial Regulation is estimated at EUR 400 000.
